attributes.action: Abolish the secrecy in the family courts and remove the gagging orders
attributes.additional_details:
The sad fact is that social workers snatch children for "risk of emotional abuse" from hundreds of UK mothers who have not committed any crime! Worse still, those mothers are forbidden to go to the media to protest and threatened with jail if they do!
We are petitioning for the secrecy of the family courts to be opened and for the ‘Gagging Orders’ to be removed from parents who have had their children illegally removed by the state and social services.
attributes.background: Stop putting families under gagging orders.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593754
